net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.component.event

Interface ComponentListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComponentAdapter, DestroyApplicationOnClose, MessageContainer, RemoveUITaskListener, UnregisterWorkspaceHandlerListener, WindowManager

    public interface ComponentListener
extends EventListener
    Listener interface for component events.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
    See Also:
    ComponentEvent

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void componentClosed(ComponentEvent e)
      Invoked when the component is closed.
      void componentHidden(ComponentEvent e)
      Invoked when the component has been made invisible.
      void componentInvalidated(ComponentEvent e)
      Invoked when the component is invalidated.
      void componentMoved(ComponentEvent e)
      Invoked when the component is moved.
      void componentResized(ComponentEvent e)
      Invoked when the component is resized.
      void componentShown(ComponentEvent e)
      Invoked when the component has been made visible.
      void componentValidated(ComponentEvent e)
      Invoked when the component is validated.

    • Method Detail

      • componentClosed

        void componentClosed(ComponentEvent e)
        Invoked when the component is closed. At this point the component has already been removed from the component tree.
        Parameters:
        e - The component event, never null.

      • componentHidden

        void componentHidden(ComponentEvent e)
        Invoked when the component has been made invisible. This does not necessarily match the value of the getVisible() result from the component object.
        Parameters:
        e - The component event, never null.

      • componentInvalidated

        void componentInvalidated(ComponentEvent e)
        Invoked when the component is invalidated.
        Parameters:
        e - The component event, never null.

      • componentMoved

        void componentMoved(ComponentEvent e)
        Invoked when the component is moved.
        Parameters:
        e - The component event, never null.

      • componentResized

        void componentResized(ComponentEvent e)
        Invoked when the component is resized.
        Parameters:
        e - The component event, never null.

      • componentShown

        void componentShown(ComponentEvent e)
        Invoked when the component has been made visible.
        Parameters:
        e - The component event, never null.

      • componentValidated

        void componentValidated(ComponentEvent e)
        Invoked when the component is validated.
        Parameters:
        e - The component event, never null.
